      Methods in de.fu_berlin.maniac.general with parameters of type Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Mothership.isForUser(Packet dg_pck)
      A advert is for the user if the data packet being advertised has not already been won by this node at some other auction and also if the advert is either from this nodes associated backbone OR any other node.
      void ManiacLogger.sendToLogger(Packet packet)
      Use this function to log a packet, this works for all packet Types except checks

      Methods in de.fu_berlin.maniac.network_manager with parameters of type Packet

      void Sender.send(Packet packet)
      Call yourSender.send(packet) fire your Advertise, Bid, Data or BidWin into the network.

    • Uses of Packet in de.fu_berlin.maniac.packet_builder

      Subclasses of Packet in de.fu_berlin.maniac.packet_builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Advert
      Adverts are sent ( by the AuctionManager ) to start the bidding process for a Data packet that has to be forwarded.
      class  Bid
      Bids are a node's answer to an Advert.
      class  BidWin
      The node that has started an auction by sending an Advert will announce the winner by broadcasting a BidWin packet.
      class  Check
      Checks are sent to nodes over the TCP connection between a node and their backbone router every time a node's bank account changes.
      class  Data
      The Data that is being forwarded through the mesh network.
      Methods in de.fu_berlin.maniac.packet_builder that return Packet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Packet PacketBuilder.buildAdvert(Data data, int maxBid, int fine)
      build Advert from scratch

      Builds an Advert from scratch

      build Bid from scratch

      build BidWin from scratch
      Packet PacketBuilderInterface.buildBidWin(Bid bid, int fine)
      Builds a BidWin from scratch
      Packet PacketBuilder.buildCheck(java.lang.String rawData)
      Builds a Check from a String (since all Data sent over TCP is sent as Strings this method uses Strings rather than byte[]).
      The String's format is as follows:
      Starting with the Packet type, followed by the information divided by spaces.
      Packet PacketBuilderInterface.buildCheck(java.lang.String rawData)
      Builds a Check from a String (since all Data sent over TCP is sent as Strings this method uses Strings rather than byte[]).
      The String's format is as follows:
      Starting with the Packet type, followed by the information divided by spaces.
      Packet PacketBuilder.buildDummyBid(int transactionID, int bid)
      Builds a dummy Bid in case no Bid was received
      Packet PacketBuilderInterface.buildDummyBid(int transactionID, int bid)
      Builds a dummy Bid in case no Bid was received

      Packet PacketBuilderInterface.buildPacket(byte[] rawdata, java.net.Inet4Address sourceIP)

      Packet PacketBuilderInterface.buildPacket(java.net.DatagramPacket data)
